title: Fix Gong client to match official OpenAPI spec
description: Critical: Our Gong client uses non-existent endpoints. Must rewrite get_transcript() to use POST /v2/calls/transcript, update data models for Monologue structure, and fix list_calls() pagination.
close_reason:
Fixed Gong client to match official OpenAPI spec v2:

‚úÖ COMPLETED CHANGES:
1. Updated gong/types.py:
   - Replaced GongTranscriptSegment with GongSentence (start/end in ms)
   - Added GongMonologue (speaker + topic + sentences)
   - Updated GongTranscript to use monologues structure
   - Added get_flat_segments() for backward compatibility

2. Updated gong/client.py:
   - Rewrote get_transcript() to use POST /v2/calls/transcript
   - Added call_metadata parameter for optimized date range queries
   - Fixed list_calls() to use cursor pagination (removed unsupported 'limit')
   - Documented search_calls() as non-existent (raises NotImplementedError)
   - Updated imports for new types

3. Updated flows/process_new_call.py:
   - Modified store_transcript() to flatten monologues‚Üísentences
   - Store topic in topics array, timing metadata in chunk_metadata JSONB
   - Pass call_metadata to get_transcript() for efficiency

üìÑ DOCUMENTATION CREATED:
- .openspec/GONG_CLIENT_AUDIT.md - Full API comparison
- .openspec/SCHEMA_CHANGES_NEEDED.md - Database migration guide
- .openspec/gong-api-v2-openapi.json - Official OpenAPI spec (400KB)

‚ö†Ô∏è SCHEMA UPDATES NEEDED (documented):
- Rename timestamp_seconds ‚Üí start_time_ms
- Add end_time_ms, duration_ms fields (currently in chunk_metadata)
- Make sentiment optional (not provided by Gong API)
- See SCHEMA_CHANGES_NEEDED.md for migration path

üß™ TESTING REQUIRED:
- Test get_call() with real Gong API
- Test get_transcript() POST endpoint with real credentials
- Verify cursor pagination in list_calls()
- End-to-end webhook processing flow
- Database schema migration

title: Phase 3: Analysis Engine - Claude API Integration
close_reason:
